data.field:
Here at the Monastery, the word "saint" can mean a few different things, depending on context:

  • It can mean users of exactly [id://244022];
  • It can refer to all users of [id://244022] and above, collectively;
  • It could be a reference to those users who have made the [id://3559] list (which is really just users of at least [id://504005]);
  • It could mean anyone of a humble, generous, and compassionate nature, regardless of level in the [id://5938|PerlMonks cosmos].
